general_advisory: Based on five days weather forecast, farmers can continue intercultural operations, harvesting of matured produces, and application of pesticides mixed with sticker as needed. Field preparation should be started for rabi crops. Regular surveillance for insect pests is recommended. Farmers are advised to transplant seedlings of various crops during clear weather.

advisory: Apply Tricyclazole for neck blast disease management
Spray chlorpyriofos or profenofos to control steam borer & leaf folder
Spray Imidachloprid to control BPH
For ear cutting caterpillar control, spray Quinalphos or Chlorpyriphos at root zone in the morning
Harvest cobs at maturity
Present weather conditions are favorable for sowing of Horse gram & Bengal gram
Start land preparation and sowing of suitable varieties
Spray neem oil to control insects at seedling stage
Go for weeding and apply urea and MoP per acre
Apply irrigation as there is insufficient rainfall
Prepare nursery beds and sow seeds based on variety
Transplant seedlings during clear weather
Prepare nursery beds and sow seeds based on variety
Transplant seedlings during clear weather
Complete 3rd weeding and top dressing
Control rhizome rot using recommended solutions
Regularly check for dehydration, heat stress, and parasitic infections
Deworm and vaccinate animals against common diseases
